text: Clemaxia is a genus of flies in the family Pyrgotidae. == Species == *C. adolfifriderici Enderlein, 1942 *C. angustiangulata Enderlein, 1942 *C. angusticornis Enderlein, 1942 *C. angustipalpis Enderlein, 1942 *C. flaviventris Mayer, 1953 *C. gracilis (Hendel, 1914) == References == Category:Pyrgotidae Category:Diptera of Africa Category:Brachycera genera Category:Taxa named by Günther Enderlein
title: Clemaxia
